query: UPDATE blog_posts SET content = REGEXP_REPLACE(content, '\\*\\*Category:\\*\\*[^-]*\\*\\*Published:\\*\\*[^-]*---\\s*', '') WHERE content LIKE '%**Category:**%**Published:**%'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4VGETmSGRFvHYrB.root --database WFL2GeYUk6Uk7UT2Y8LCmo --execute UPDATE blog_posts SET content = REGEXP_REPLACE(content, '\\*\\*Category:\\*\\*[^-]*\\*\\*Published:\\*\\*[^-]*---\\s*', '') WHERE content LIKE '%**Category:**%**Published:**%'
